channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 11, 2022
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth that has to do with things that interest me:

  • AI/data science
  • data in general
  • data architecture
  • streaming
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me for the week just ending. This week, there hasn’t been that much that has caught my eye, but here it is.
